H0.text: Erasmus of Rotterdam (1466-1536) is a revered. Renaissance Scholar

H1.text: Erasmus of Rotterdam (1466-1536) is a revered. Dutch Theologian

H2.text: Erasmus of Rotterdam (1466-1536) is a revered. Classical Translator

H3.text: Erasmus of Rotterdam (1466-1536) is a revered. Christian humanist

A5.text: Erasmus prepared pioneering editions of the New Testament and Church Fathers in Latin and Greek

A6.text: Erasmus: Christian Humanist/Literary Primate of 16th century

A7.text: Erasmus was the greatest scholar of the northern Renaissance and the most widely influential Christian humanist scholar in history, becoming the most famous scholar in Europe in his day.

A8.text: Erasmus gained incredible success as a textual scholar, interpreting, translating and editing numerous texts of Greek and Roman classics, Church Fathers and the Bible.
